title: Zarechny Peshnigort
text:
Zarechny Peshnigort () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Stepanovskoye Rural Settlement, <a href="Kudymkarsky%20District">Kudymkarsky District</a>, <a href="Perm%20Krai">Perm Krai</a>, Russia. The population was 68 as of 2010.
Geography.
Zarechny Peshnigort is located 9 km southwest of <a href="Kudymkar">Kudymkar</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Peshnigort is the nearest rural locality.
